title: Having problems...
body:
ok so, i start up the client and maybe 15 seconds later i get a rads error, saying something about i should check my connection, but it runs fine on forums, youtube, pretty much anything. But then i try to also re-download the game and it just says webpage not available? and i cant run a repair cause it doesnt get past the logo... need help please. Also went through firewall to see if it was blocked and it wasnt...
Thanks.

Edit: ok also just remembered, at the end of my last game, LoL just completely disconnected at a moments notice. also happened to my friend that was staying over at the time, but he says its working again back at his house... so idk if its also got something to do with my internet... but as i said above, everything else works.

replies.body:
i am no longer having a problem,i just watched a youtube vid that told me how to chang my DNS and everything is working, here is the clip if you need it...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lP83H9l_VXs

I think that's the thirtieth time I've seen this problem. They aren't doing anything about it.

I'm kinda missing the Mac players now.

not even gonna bother if this is how long you have to wait for an answer...

edit: another 4 hours later and still no reply.... wow riot....

Same thing happening to me. Even posted a comment on riots board posts. No reply

THANKS RIOT
